scripts.setup:reveal: mkdir -p public/reveal/theme public/reveal/plugin/highlight && cp node_modules/reveal.js/dist/reveal.css public/reveal/ && cp node_modules/reveal.js/dist/reveal.esm.js public/reveal/ && cp node_modules/reveal.js/dist/theme/black.css public/reveal/theme/ && cp node_modules/reveal.js/plugin/highlight/highlight.esm.js public/reveal/plugin/highlight/ && cp node_modules/reveal.js/plugin/highlight/monokai.css public/reveal/plugin/highlight/
